page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ...
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A PUPIL At 7.15a.m. my alarm goes off.By 7.30a.m.I have finished my breakfast and for 20 minutes I watch T.V. Then I get dressed,wash and clean my teeth.Afterwards,I watch a video or T.V. until 8.30a.m.when I set out for school. I walk to school and get there at 8.47a.m. Then I go to the First Year Block to join my form 1L to be registered.Our first lesson is needlework, which begins at 9.15.a.m. and stops at 10.25a.m.We then have maths up to break at 11a.m.We then have science until lunch at 12.25p.m. Lessons begin again at1.40p.m. with 3 periods of English or Integrated Studies with our form teacher Mrs.Garrett.School ends at 3.30p.m. After homework,I rest and play out or watch T.V.
